topic.title: Date and Time
topic.shortdesc: You can adjust the time of TA1600/2400/3200 (including the time zone) consistent with your local time.

body.p: Go to System System preferences Date and Time to configure the system date and time.You have to reboot the system to make the changes take effect.

ul.li: Time Zone: Select your current and correct time zone on TA1600/2400/3200.
Daylight Saving Time: The option is disabled by default. Enable it when necessary.

p.uicontrol: Automatically Synchronize with an Internet Time Server

p.note: In order to adjust its internal clock to a central network server, TA1600/2400/3200 should be able to access to the Internet if you choose this method.

li.p: Set Date & Time Manually: Enter the time using the numbers on your keyboard.
